description: Assist war and/or drought affected populations to secure basic livelihoods through support to agriculture, shelter, water & sanitation, Environmental Protection, Rehabilitation and Development, strengthening the capacity of implementing partners.

subproject.description:
Previously this output assisted war/drought affected population to produce their own food (in the absence of food aid) through support to agriculture, provision of shelter (a multi-purpose room), promotion environmental protection and development, and strengthen the capacity of implementing partners, in areas of Gash Barka region.
As per the new cooperation agreement with the government, the output has been streamlined to fit the new Government priorities (water supply, health and sanitation) in 2012.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: GB Transition & Early Recovery
